body_html: This is awesome, but I would personally prefer in the absence of consensus between defaulting to dim 1 and dim -1 (I lean towards -1) that the defaults stay as they were in previous versions to reduce the amount of code that has to change. Anything with configurable dimension is great, though, and updating code isn't too hard.

body: This is awesome, but I would personally prefer in the absence of consensus between defaulting to dim 1 and dim -1 (I lean towards -1) that the defaults stay as they were in previous versions to reduce the amount of code that has to change. Anything with configurable dimension is great, though, and updating code isn't too hard.
